item.title: I Passed the OSCP with a Perfect* Score
item.description: Well, it was close enough. This blog post describes how I prepared for the OSCP, the materials I used, the lessons I learned, and my advice to future test takers.

item.title: I Passed the CCSK
item.description: Thinking about getting the CCSK certification? Here are my thoughts.
